message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe is worth more than $120 to you. Considering its unique features and high quality, I would like to propose a price of $150 for it. I'm confident this investment will provide significant value and benefits for you. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $150 is a bit steep for me. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $120. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's features and quality.
